New Records: Highest individual score for New Zealand in men's T20Is (137 runs)
Joint-most sixes in an innings in men's T20Is (16!)
Key Match Events: Finn Allen hit 16 sixes and 5 boundaries in 62 deliveries
Pakistan lost both openers cheaply and never looked like they were in the chase
Babar Azam made 58 runs with a strike rate of 156.76
Post-Match Reflections: Finn Allen was at his destructive best against Pakistan
New Zealand took an unassailable lead of 3-0 in the series
Mitchell Santner will be taking the captaincy series in the remainder of the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans reacted positively to Finn Allen's performance
Haris Rauf conceded 27 runs in one over
The match was played at the University Oval Ground in Dunedin
